product_name: The North Face  Luminous Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The soft, lightweight and highly breathable Luminous women's shirt from The North Face offers you comfort and a touch of inspiration when it's time to do your tree pose in yoga class.
short_description: The soft, lightweight and highly breathable Luminous women's shirt from The North Face offers you comfort and a touch of inspiration when it's time to do your tree pose in yoga class.
